DOC.criteria: Diagnosis multiple myeloma base standard criterion follow : Major Criteria Plasmacytomas tissue biopsy Bone marrow plasmacytosis ( > 30 % plasma cell ) Monoclonal immunoglobulin ( Ig ) spike serum electrophoresis ( IgG > 3.5 g/dL IgA > 2.0 g/dL ) ; kappa lambda light chain excretion > 1 g/day 24 hour urine protein electrophoresis Minor Criteria Bone marrow plasmacytosis ( 10 30 % plasma cell ) Monoclonal immunoglobulin present less magnitude give major criterion Normal IgM < 50 mg/dL , IgA < 100 mg/dL , IgG < 600 mg/dL Any follow set criterion confirm diagnosis Multiple Myeloma : Any two major criterion Major criterion 1 plus minor criterion b , c Major criterion 3 plus minor criterion c Minor criterion , b c Measurable disease , define monoclonal immunoglobulin spike serum electrophoresis ≥ 1 g/dL and/or urine monoclonal immunoglobulin spike ≥ 200 mg/24 hour . Nonsecretors must measurable protein Freelite measurable disease plasmacytoma eligible . Has asymptomatic disease , i.e. , hypercalcemia , renal insufficiency , anemia bone lesion . Karnofsky performance status ≥ 80 ( See Appendix B ) Is infertile ( i.e . surgically sterile 12 month postmenopausal ) practice adequate form contraception , judge investigator ( i.e. , birth control pill , double barrier method , abstinence , etc . ) Age 18 year old Has give voluntary write informed consent , prior studyrelated procedure part normal medical care , understand patient may withdraw consent time without prejudice future medical care . Prior treatment myeloma ( symptomatic asymptomatic ) . POEMS syndrome ( plasma cell dyscrasia polyneuropathy , organomegaly , endocrinopathy , monoclonal protein ( Mprotein ) skin change ) Plasma cell leukemia Patients history thyroid problem . Receiving steroid > equivalent 10 mg prednisone daily medical condition , e.g. , asthma , systemic lupus erythematosis , rheumatoid arthritis Infection control antibiotic Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) infection . Patients provide consent HIV test accord institution 's standard practice Known active hepatitis B C New York Hospital Association ( NYHA ) Class III IV heart failure EKG evidence acute ischemic disease Second malignancy require treatment last 3 year Other serious medical psychiatric illness could potentially interfere completion treatment accord protocol Positive pregnancy test woman childbearing potential
